attributes.action: Stop Black Friday coming to Britain
attributes.additional_details:
American businesses are introducing Black Friday sales in the UK. UK retailers feel pressured to compete. In America Black Friday encourages a frenzy of greed opposite to the spirit of Christmas. It causes riots; employees and the public get injured, public property is damaged and the police are called off important duties to keep order.
We already have post-Christmas sales.
For the sake of public order we call for a a UK ban on Black Friday and other short-term sales in December.
